name: Planet Aid
description:
Come on an adventure with the terraforming ship of the future! Visit planets to make them suitable for life by changing the atmosphere and growing trees.

Fly around planets in 360 degrees. Each planet is procedurally generated, changing the amount of items on each, their color and style.

After each one minute game you have the possibility to  view your accomplishments and participate in the Leaderboard to make your mark!

How to play:

Move by using the WASD or arrow keys. Press Escape to pause.

Please send me feedback on your experience and most of all enjoy your time planet aiding!
